spanishText: La política es dar multas a los infractores.
englishText: The policy is to give tickets to offenders.

spanishText: Parece ser algo fuera de alcance.
englishText: It appears to be something out of reach.

spanishText: Le vamos a dar medicina por vía intravenosa.
englishText: We are going to give you an intravenous medicine.

spanishText: Ese reloj fue un regalo de mi mujer.
englishText: That watch was a present from my wife

spanishText: La película que vimos anoche era divertidísima.
englishText: The movie we watched last night was hilarious.
